verbs.description: experimentize (third-person singular simple present experimentizes, present participle experimentizing, simple past and past participle experimentized)

entries.meaning: (intransitive, archaic) To perform a scientific experiment.
examples: I think you will have to modify your belief about the difficulty of dispersal of land molluscs; I was interrupted when beginning to experimentize on the just hatched young adhering to the feet of ground-roosting birds.
